response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its market position and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my desired return, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1350000}
